pageProps.data:
## ColorSegmentation

###### Description

Color segmentation of given image with simple Euclidian
 distance estimation.

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Current frame.|
|**clusters**|<var>number</var>|Number of clusters the input image to be clustered.|

###### Example

```js
// segmentation of input image to 5 clusters
 gm.colorSegmentation(inputImage, 5);
```
